verbs.description: Alice Marie Johnson , whose life sentence for nonviolent drug offenses [V: was] commuted by President Donald Trump , was released from prison Wednesday afternoon . Footage from local news crews showed Johnson racing toward her family and friends who had arrived to greet her .
